sources.name: Incomes across the Distribution Database – Gini
sources.description:
Data published by Incomes across the Distribution Database
Data publisher's source The data source for the Incomes Across the Distribution Database is LIS microdata: Luxembourg Income Study (LIS) Database, http://www.lisdatacenter.org (multiple countries; Micro data runs for multiple countries completed in September 2015.). Luxembourg: LIS.
Link https://ourworldindata.org/incomes-across-the-distribution/
Retrieved 2016-11-01
